version_description:
* Comet Lovejoy added to the Comets pack
* Various bugs fixed including:
- Shader fix for extended planets

* Comet Lovejoy added to the Comets pack
* Various bugs fixed including:
- Shader fix for extended planets

*** We are aware of a new bug in iOS8. It is being addressed ASAP, for more info: http://goo.gl/FiszOs ***

Many enhancements including:
- Improved Sky Search Menu: tap section headings to expand/hide.
- Improved calendar: "On this day.." events now appear, as well as numbered badges clearly leading you to any missed events.
- Sharing has been revamped and is now contextual when an object is selected
- More asteroids and comets have been included in the upgrades.

As well as all the usual optimisations and bug fixes. Enjoy!

*** We are aware of a new bug in iOS8. It is being addressed ASAP, for more info: http://goo.gl/FiszOs ***

Many enhancements including:
- Improved Sky Search Menu: tap section headings to expand/hide.
- Improved calendar: "On this day.." events now appear, as well as numbered badges clearly leading you to any missed events.
- Sharing has been revamped and is now contextual when an object is selected
- More asteroids and comets have been included in the upgrades.

As well as all the usual optimisations and bug fixes. Enjoy!

- bug fix for AR Mode not working when Settings>Privacy>Location Services>System Services>Compass Calibration is set to off. This prevents Star Chart from getting a reading for True North, and so now it falls back on using Magnetic North in this situation.

- bug fix for AR Mode not working when Settings>Privacy>Location Services>System Services>Compass Calibration is set to off. This prevents Star Chart from getting a reading for True North, and so now it falls back on using Magnetic North in this situation.
Fixed crash on iPad when trying to access Settings (iOS9 only)
Fixed crash on iPad when trying to access Settings (iOS9 only)

A couple more iOS9 specific fixes:
- fixed descriptive text getting truncated for planets, constellations etc
- fixed Star Chart User Manual failing to open due to new security features
- fixed Star Chart on Facebook/Twitter links failing to open due to new security features

A couple more iOS9 specific fixes:
- fixed descriptive text getting truncated for planets, constellations etc
- fixed Star Chart User Manual failing to open due to new security features
- fixed Star Chart on Facebook/Twitter links failing to open due to new security features

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

A few bug fixes:
- Fixed occasional crash when selecting constellations, either from search or by directly tapping on them.
- Star Chart now understands that Pluto has 5 moons, not 4.
- When running in an English variant other than US English, planet/moon order text was not displaying correctly.
